nodes.text: The temple on Hynestia, also known as the temple outpost, was a Jedi Order outpost located on the planet Hynestia during the High Republic Era. Jedi Master Stellan Gios was stationed there at the time of the Great Hyperspace Disaster, and travelled from there to aid the Hetzal system when it came under threat. Jedi who had trained at the temple, such as Gios' former Padawan Vernestra Rwoh, wore a particular pattern of golden detailing on their robes to denote this.
